stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, trash a rezzed piece of ice. Reveal cards from the top of R&D until you reveal a piece of ice. Install and rez that ice in the same position as the ice that was trashed, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, trash a rezzed piece of ice.
Reveal cards from the top of R&D until you reveal a piece of ice. Install and rez that ice in the same position as the ice that was trashed, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
title: Mutate
